## Language metadata table prototype This is page works as follows: 1. Loads the LMT into the browser dynamically as xml from a known location 2. Repeat with the xslt style sheet from a known location 3. Apply the transform to the XML and display the results in a an element called `rendering` Code is on [GitHub](https://github.com/mrmxf/proto-lmt). With a little work, there could be several renderings available from a menu.
